style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK3543  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR3543  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM3543  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">14</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR3543  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA3543.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2427 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">This 
Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of
Operations should be read in conjunction with all of our reports to the SEC and 
the related notes included elsewhere in this report.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2428 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2429 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">RESULTS OF 
OPERATIONS</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2430 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2431 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Three and 
six months ended June 30, 2014 compared to three and six months ended June 30, 
2013</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2432 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><I>&nbsp;</I></FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2433 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><I>Revenue.</I> During the three and six months ended June 30, 2014, the 
Company generated revenues of $1,106,000, and $2,137,000, a decrease of $637,000
or 37%, and $760,000 or 26% respectively compared to the same periods in 2013. 
The Company&#8217;s revenues decreased as a result of poor production in the 
month of June due to inclement weather. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2434 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2435 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">During the 
three and six months ended June 30, 2014, the Company generated revenues from 
oil and gas sales of $1,062,000, and $2,171,000, a decrease of $296,000 or 22%, 
and $141,000 or 6% respectively compared to the same periods in 2013. The 
Company&#8217;s revenues decreased as a result of poor production in the month 
of June due to inclement weather. The Company sold 5,436 net BBL at an average 
price of $99.81 during the quarter ended June 30, 2014 compared to 6,502 
net&nbsp;BBL at an average price of 80.01 during the same time period in 2013. 
The Company sold 33,836 net&nbsp;MCF at an average price of $11.31 during the 
quarter ended June 30, 2014 compared to 24,076 net&nbsp;MCF at an average price 
of $8.30 during the same time period in 2013.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2436 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2437 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><I>Total 
Expenses.</I> During the three and six months ended June 30, 2014, total 
expenses, which are comprised of depreciation, operating costs and general and 
administrative expenses, were $1,053,000 and $1,993,000, a decrease of $303,000 
or 22% and $455,000 or 19% respectively compared to the same periods in 2013. 
The decrease is primarily due to a reduction of General and Administrative 
Expenses for payroll and legal fees.&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2438 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2439 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">LIQUIDITY 
AND CAPITAL RESOURCES</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2440 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2441 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Net cash 
used in operating activities was $1,189,000 for the six months of 2014, a 
decrease of $1,657,000 compared to the same time period in 2013. The decrease is
primarily a result of the reduction in accounts payable and accrued 
liabilities.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2442 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2443 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Net cash 
provided by investing activities of $125,000 was realized because of a 
disposition of an oil and gas property during the first six months of 2014. This
is an increase $1,867,000 from the six months of 2013. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2444 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2445 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Net cash 
provided by financing activities in the first six months of 2014 of $1,642,000 
is due to the issuance of the Company&#8217;s preferred stock for cash. This was
a decrease from our net cash provided by financing activities of $830,000 during
the first six months of 2013.&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2446 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2447 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">As of June 
30, 2014, the Company currently has no material agreements for capital 
expenditures. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2448 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2449 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">As of June 
30, 2014, the current terms of the Company&#8217;s credit facility with Green 
Bank are $16,250,000, that has been agreed to be reduced to $15,875,000, that 
matures on June 1, 2015 with a 4-4.5% annual floating interest rate which 
requires an approximate monthly payment of $63,000. </FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2450 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK3544  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR3544  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM3544  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">15</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR3544  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA3544.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P id=PARA2456 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">OFF-BALANCE 
SHEET ARRANGEMENTS</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2457 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2458 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">From time-
to-time, we enter into off-balance sheet arrangements and transactions that can 
give rise to off-balance sheet obligations. As of June 30, 2014, the off-balance
sheet arrangements and transactions that we had entered into included operating 
lease agreements, personal guarantees of our line of credit with Green Bank by 
three of the Officers and majority stockholders and gas transportation 
commitments. The Company does not believe that these arrangements are reasonably
likely to materially affect its liquidity or availability of, or requirements
for, capital resources currently or in the future.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2459 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2460 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">ITEM 3. 
Quantitative and Qualitative disclosures about Market Risk</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2461 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2462 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Not 
applicable.</FONT></P><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, Times, serif">
<P id=PARA338 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">ITEM 4. CONTROLS AND 
PROCEDURES</FONT></P></FONT>
<P id=PARA2464 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</P>
<P id=PARA331 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif"><I><B>Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and Procedures</B></I></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&nbsp;</P>
<P id=PARA332 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Disclosure 
controls and procedures are controls and other procedures that are designed to 
ensure that information required to be disclosed by us in reports that we file 
or submit under the Exchange Act is recorded, processed, summarized and 
reported, within the time periods specified in the Securities and Exchange 
Commission&#8217;s rules and forms. Disclosure controls and procedures include, 
without limitation, controls and procedures designed to ensure that information 
required to be disclosed in the reports that we file or submit under the 
Exchange Act is accumulated and communicated to our management, including our 
principal executive and principal financial officers, or persons performing 
similar functions, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding required 
disclosure. There are inherent limitations to the effectiveness of any system of
disclosure controls and procedures. Accordingly, even effective disclosure 
controls and procedures can only provide reasonable assurance of achieving their
control objectives.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA333 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA334 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Under the 
supervision and with the participation of our management, including our chief 
executive, we evaluated the effectiveness of our disclosure controls and 
procedures as of June 30, 2014. Based on that evaluation we have concluded that 
our disclosure controls and procedures were ineffective.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA335 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA336 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"><B>Changes 
in Internal Controls over Financial Reporting</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
1.25"><STRONG></STRONG>&nbsp;</P>
<P id=PARA337 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">During the 
six months ended June 30, 2014, there have been no changes in our internal 
control over financial reporting that have materially affected or are reasonably
likely to materially affect internal control over financial
reporting.</FONT></P></FONT>
<P id=PARA2473 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<DIV id=PGBK3545  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR3545  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM3545  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">16</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR3545  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA3545.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT>&nbsp;<FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2485 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">PART II - 
OTHER INFORMATION</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2486 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2487 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Item 1. 
Legal Proceedings.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2488 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA414 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Enexco, 
Inc., et al. v. Cabot Oil &amp; Gas Corporation v. Palace Exploration, Co., 
Cause No. 10CV31,293 consolidated with Cause No. 11CV31,487, pending in the 
123rd/273rd District Court of Shelby County, Texas.&nbsp; TransCoastal 
Corporation (&#8220;TransCoastal&#8221;), along with other interest owners, 
filed this suit in July 2011 to recover damages to certain wells located in 
Shelby County, Texas.&nbsp; TransCoastal alleges that Defendant Cabot Oil &amp; 
Gas Corporation (&#8220;Cabot&#8221;) damaged those wells during the course of 
its drilling activities and has brought claims for gross negligence, nuisance, 
negligence, declaratory judgment, breach of contract, and exemplary 
damages.&nbsp; Cabot filed a counterclaim against TransCoastal alleging breach 
of contract.&nbsp; Cabot seeks approximately $119,202.38 in damages, which Cabot
contends TransCoastal owes for Cabot&#8217;s drilling activities.&nbsp; 
</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA415 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2489 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Aside from 
the&nbsp;aforementioned, the&nbsp;Company is not a party to any material pending
legal or governmental proceedings, other than ordinary routine litigation 
incidental to the industry. While the ultimate outcome and impact of any 
proceeding cannot be predicted with certainty, management believes that the 
resolution of any proceeding will not have a material adverse effect on the 
financial condition or results of operations.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2490 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2491 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Item 1A.Risk
Factors.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2492 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2493 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
1.25"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">Oil and Gas Drilling Is A High-Risk Activity.</FONT></B><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"> Our future 
success will depend on the success of TransCoastal&#39;s drilling programs. In 
addition to the numerous operating risks described in more detail below, these 
activities involve the risk that no commercially productive oil or gas 
reservoirs will be discovered. In addition, we are often uncertain as to the 
future cost or timing of drilling, completing and producing wells. Furthermore, 
our drilling operations may be curtailed, delayed or canceled as a result of a 
variety of factors, including, but not limited to, the following:</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2494 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2497  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2495 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2496 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- unexpected
drilling conditions; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2498 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2501  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2499 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2500 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- pressure 
or irregularities in formations; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2502 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2505  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2503 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2504 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- equipment 
failures or accidents; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2506 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2507 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2508 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- adverse 
weather conditions; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2510 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- inability 
to comply with governmental requirements; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2514 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,

<P id=PARA2516 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- shortage 
or delays in the availability of drilling rigs and the delivery of equipment. 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2518 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New

<DIV id=PGBK3546  style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<DIV id=PGFTR3546  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV id=PGNUM3546  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: 
center">17</DIV>
<HR style="HEIGHT: 2px; WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV id=PGHDR3546  style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P id=PARA3546.2 style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN-TOP: 0px"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P id=PARA2524 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">If 
TransCoastal experiences any of these problems, our ability to conduct 
operations could be adversely affected.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2525 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2526 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
1.25"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">Factors Beyond Our Control Affect Our Ability To Market Oil And 
Gas.</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
Times, serif"> Our ability to market oil and gas from our TransCoastal 
subsidiary wells depends upon numerous factors beyond our control. These factors
include, but are not limited to, the following:</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2527 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2530  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2528 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2529 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the level 
of domestic production and imports of oil and gas; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2531 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2534  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2532 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2533 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the 
proximity of gas production to gas pipelines; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2535 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2538  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2536 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2537 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the 
availability of pipeline capacity; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2539 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2542  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2540 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2541 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the demand
for oil and gas by utilities and other end users; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2543 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2546  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2544 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2545 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the 
availability of alternate fuel sources; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2547 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2550  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2548 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2549 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the effect
of inclement weather; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2551 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2554  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2552 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2553 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- state and 
federal regulation of oil and gas marketing; and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2555 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2558  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2556 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2557 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- federal 
regulation of gas sold or transported in interstate commerce. 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2559 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2560 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">If these 
factors were to change dramatically, our ability to market oil and gas or obtain
favorable prices for our oil and gas could be adversely affected.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2561 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2562 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
1.25"><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">The Marketability Of Our Production May Be Dependent Upon Transportation 
Facilities Over Which We Have No Control. </FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">The marketability of our 
production depends in part upon the availability, proximity, and capacity of 
pipelines, natural gas gathering systems and processing facilities. Any 
significant change in market factors affecting these infrastructure facilities 
could harm our business. TransCoastal delivers some of their oil and natural gas
through gathering systems and pipelines that we do not own. These facilities may
not be available to us in the future.</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2563 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2564 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">Oil and 
natural gas prices are volatile. A substantial decrease in oil and natural gas 
prices could adversely affect our financial results. Our future financial 
condition, results of operations and the carrying value of our oil and natural 
gas properties depend primarily upon the prices we receive for our oil and 
natural gas production. Oil and natural gas prices historically have been 
volatile and likely will continue to be volatile in the future, especially given
world geopolitical conditions. Our cash flow from operations is highly dependent
on the prices that we receive for oil and natural gas. This price volatility 
also affects the amount of our cash flow available for capital expenditures and 
our ability to borrow money or raise additional capital. The amount we can 
borrow or have outstanding under or bank credit facility is subject to semi-
annual redeterminations. Oil prices are likely to affect us more than natural 
gas prices because approximately 70% of our proved reserves are oil. The prices 
for oil and natural gas are subject to a variety of additional factors that are 
beyond our control. These factors include:</FONT></P>
<P id=PARA2565 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2568  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2566 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2567 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the level 
of consumer demand for oil and natural gas; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2569 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2572  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0px" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2570 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2571 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- the 
domestic and foreign supply of oil and natural gas; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2573 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, 
serif">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE id=TBL2576  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,

<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

<P id=PARA2575 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT

agree to and maintain oil price and production controls; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2577 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT

<P id=PARA2579 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT

<P id=PARA2581 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT

<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2582 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT

serif">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 98.1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2583 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif">- domestic 
governmental regulations and taxes; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P id=PARA2585 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,

<TABLE id=TBL2588  style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times,

<TD style="WIDTH: 1.9%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA2586 style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><FONT
